description: This file contains pytest-based unit tests for the universalinit project, specifically testing the ExpressTemplate initialization, project setup, configuration loading, and template variable substitution.

classes.name: ProjectConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for project parameters, including name, version, description, author, project type, output path, and additional parameters.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration for different project types, with EXPRESS as one of the options.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Data structure holding initialization commands and configuration for project templates, such as openapi generation, environment configuration, build commands, install dependencies, run tools, linter, and post-processing scripts.

methods.name: test_express_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that the ExpressTemplate correctly provides initialization info including openapi generation command and environment setup.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the complete project initialization process, ensuring output structure and content are correctly generated.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Checks that the post-processing script executes successfully and creates expected artifacts.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures project configuration can be loaded correctly from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that template variables in files are correctly replaced with project configuration values during initialization.
